Description.Text: To make your stay in York truly memorable, Hotel Noir likes to add a few luxuries and personal touches to your room - with quality bed linen, a great flat screen and your complimentary mini-bar*. Add to this the fact that you won't pay extra to check your emails or leave your car and they hope you will feel completely at home. The 800 yard walk to York Minster and the city walls is on a flat wide pavement - this is an easy 10-15 minute walk for most people. For guests in high heels or those simply looking for an easier journey there is a regular bus service or they will always be happy to arrange a taxi. This great location means they are away from city noises of crowds and trains but they are on one of the main routes into York
